blessings.title: Divine Healing
blessings.blessing: May Vaidyanath, the celestial physician, heal all ailments of your body, mind, and spirit
blessings.significance: Shiva's name 'Vaidyanath' (Lord of Physicians) was earned here. Countless devotees report miraculous healings after sincere offerings and prayers.
blessings.experience: Offer Ganga water with heartfelt prayer for healing, visualizing the Lord's grace flowing through you

blessings.title: Liberation from Karma
blessings.blessing: May the weight of past actions be lifted and your soul freed for spiritual progress
blessings.significance: Even Ravana received grace here. The Shiva Purana promises that sincere devotion at Vaidyanath can break karmic chains accumulated over lifetimes.
blessings.experience: Complete the parikrama of all 22 temples in the complex with full devotion

blessings.title: Protection of Family
blessings.blessing: May your entire family be protected by Vaidyanath's healing and protective grace
blessings.significance: Devotees traditionally come not just for themselves but to seek blessings for their entire family's health and welfare.
blessings.experience: Bring prasad home for family members who couldn't join the pilgrimage

pilgrimage_blessing: As you leave Baidyanath Dham, know that the Divine Physician walks with you. The grace that healed ten heads of Ravana is more than sufficient for your needs. Carry the healing energy of this sacred place in your heart.
